page.title: 04HARTSWOOD ESTATE REIGATE
page.content: Hitching's Way is in a private estate.Behind the back gardens is a playing field with an alley through. There is also a pavilion called the Hartswood Pavilion.They hold a nursery school there.There is a number of clubs such as table tennis,bingo and a club for old people.Table tennis occurs on Wednesday and it costs 10p. Adults can go on Monday.The estate consists of Hartswood Avenue,Hitchings Way,Baron's Way and Matthew's Street. Some people have started a Residents' Association.It costs 30p to join per family.They hold parties and social evenings at the pavilion.In the pavilion there are the main hall toilets and a kitchen.In the garden there is a shed with things for the nursery and table tennis.In the hall there is a piano.
